entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, described as seeing Death Eaters Apparating around him.

entities.name: death eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Voldemort, mentioned as Apparating between graves.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: A person whose body is lying on the ground beside a cup.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Harry's friend who makes a noise as though about to say something.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A wise and powerful wizard who raises his hand to stop Sirius from speaking.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story, who is talking about a traumatic event.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: A person who pierces Harry's arm with a dagger.

relationships.description: Harry has Sirius' hand on his shoulder.
Dumbledore raises his hand to stop Sirius from speaking.
Wormtail pierces Harry's arm with a dagger.
